title: Add Your Subtitles
explanation: Paste your subtitles here without timings. When you generate subtitles, the system will focus on matching these texts with the audio and creating accurate timings. Each line will be treated as a separate subtitle.
example:
Hello, welcome to our tutorial.
Today we will learn about machine learning.
Let's get started!
generateBackground: Do you want to generate background image inspired from this album art and lyrics?
gemini25Warning: (Gemini 2.5 Pro, 2.5 Flash, 2.5 Flash Lite) do not work well for this use case
autoEraseBlankLinesHelp: Automatically remove empty lines from pasted text and existing content. Does not interfere while typing.
